meanings.definition: The process of making something conform to a standard.
meanings.sent1: The standardizations in our company ensure all products meet the same quality level.
meanings.sent2: The industry relies on standardizations to guarantee safety and reliability.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best standardizations award was fierce among the teams.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in standardizations was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The importance of standardizations cannot be overstated in the manufacturing sector.

meanings.definition: The act of establishing a standard for something.
meanings.sent1: The standardizations set by the committee were followed by all members.
meanings.sent2: The government's standardizations aimed to improve public health.
meanings.sent3: The standardizations for the new dress code caused quite a stir among employees.
meanings.sent4: His leadership in standardizations was like a guiding light for the team.
meanings.sent5: The impact of standardizations on efficiency was immediately noticeable.

meanings.definition: The practice of maintaining consistency or uniformity in something.
meanings.sent1: The standardizations in recipe measurements ensure the same taste every time.
meanings.sent2: The company's standardizations in customer service set them apart from competitors.
meanings.sent3: The standardizations in office attire led to some interesting fashion choices.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to standardizations was like a steady anchor in turbulent times.
meanings.sent5: The success of the project was attributed to the team's commitment to standardizations.
